headline: Show HN: GitHub Based Accommodation
description:
Hi all, A few years ago, I wanted to have other interesting people stay over for free in our spare room.

Hackers/doers/makers/conference speakers, there are no "interesting" filters on Airbnb.

So I created a fun hack, https://www.gitsurf.com/, based entirely on Github mechanics, which has a very high barrier to entry.

https://www.gitsurf.com/pages/man has more information on how it works.

Would people here use it? Should it be entirely open sourced? Any suggestions?
